name: 象曰_一排大石头

sources: [微信公众号讣告：阳光属于你，我是向阳花](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIzODQ4Mjg5Nw==&mid=2247485753&idx=1&sn=19b20299289de1e492687211c02d6e2f&chksm=e939ed87de4e6491d047c7be40aa2eae5412c3f4cd710cbbb44475b9ccb46a5c20bb6ccd3df1&sessionid=0&scene=126&subscene=7&clicktime=1767789813&enterid=1767789813&ascene=3&fasttmpl_type=0&fasttmpl_fullversion=8074465-zh_CN-zip&fasttmpl_flag=0&realreporttime=1767789813210&devicetype=android-36&version=28004050&nettype=WIFI&abtest_cookie=AAACAA%3D%3D&lang=zh_CN&countrycode=IE&exportkey=n_ChQIAhIQb36kI1xWFc0qF1qOavgoLhLiAQIE97dBBAEAAAAAAJSTLOw%2FXb8AAAAOpnltbLcz9gKNyK89dVj0gAiNmJCF35jOuOKW5zS%2FRZR%2Fcu5l%2FEsZm5IPNQL1epHy2wDZfRnbwFi7ecClkh47jhRdhjHxghpRIZgE8yYHmoBgVrdlAxqTfUzcZ9pDxWsbgKY%2FoV80ZrVcqpxi2QI3lZy3a%2F%2BztBED%2BEEJHC4R0Z91dbZ2H1bSfAZXp0Fzyi26hQY7RY6gwv%2BLlVgL5MyXlBFJ%2B4jlQgUB4wbiVT0D62WRSeTbJQ5vp%2BQnObBhNRPIGPimJu1Vi1WCa9c%3D&pass_ticket=DHe21uuw%2FiE9mibA7RwDtNfSp%2B2IXiA45L2CvwONCrM4EqFpGD15A175HfIo4xqN&wx_header=3)
summary: 他是留德归来的青年艺术家与摄影推广者，用通俗语言拉低艺术门槛，却在抑郁症的阴影下安静离开，愿他在没有痛苦的彼岸，终于能安心地拍照、做访谈，不再为存在本身而挣扎。
